description:
The vision of the Colorado Energy Office (CEO) is to promote sustainable economic development in Colorado through advancing the State’s energy market and industry to create jobs, increase energy security, lower long-term consumer costs, and protect our environment.  

The CEO has identified the following top priorities:

Continue to address the gaps in the market concerning the pursuit of cost-effective investments in energy efficiency 

Continue to diversify the transportation fuels available and in use in Colorado

Promote the further development of the state’s energy economy, across all sectors

Provide leadership for continuous improvement of Colorado’s energy policies

name: Strategic Plan FY13-14 - Colorado Energy Office
